name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 4, media reported that Zhang Daibing, a doctor from the National University of Defense Technology and the founder and chairman of Hunan Changsha Yunzhihang Technology Co., Ltd., known as the "ceiling of drones", passed away on January 3 at the age of 47. At present, Zhang Daibing's family has issued an obituary.
It is rumored that Zhang Daibing jumped to his death after being in debt due to setbacks in entrepreneurship. The specific details of his death were not disclosed in the obituary.
Looking through Zhang Daibing's social accounts, he left very suddenly. On January 2, the day before his death, he posted 2 dynamics about high-altitude cleaning of drones. From the video, he was in good condition at this time, and there was no abnormality.
After Zhang Daibing passed away, his students also published a long article to mourn him. The article stated that a few days before his death, Zhang Daibing met with friends as usual, and contacted friends the day before his death. Everyone was shocked by the news of his death.
It is said that Zhang Daibing liked mathematics since he was a child. In 1995, he was admitted to the National University of Defense Technology with excellent grades...
fullContent:
1月4日，有媒体报道，国防科技大学博士，被称为「无人机天花板」的湖南长沙市云智航科技有限公司创始人、董事长张代兵，于1月3日离世，年仅47岁。目前，张代兵家人已对外发布讣告。
 网传张代兵因创业受挫负债后跳楼身亡，具体离世细节讣告中并未公开。
 翻看张代兵的社交账号，他离开的很突然，1月2日，去世前一天还发了2条动态，是关于无人机高空清洗的内容。从视频来看，此时他的状态还好好的，看不出任何异常。
 张代兵离世后，其学生还发布长文悼念，文中称去世前几天，张代兵还照常面见了友人，去世前一天还和朋友联系，大家对他离世的消息感到无比震惊。
 据称，张代兵自幼喜欢数学，95年以优秀的成绩考入国防科技大学。在校发明了电磁飞轮储能装置，以及无线充电装置，车载半导体制冷冰箱等等，受到奖励。之后专注导航以及制导专业上，在国防科技大获得博士学位后留校工作。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is said that he was born in the military and had the rank of colonel. The drone expert fell from a building and died at the age of 47 due to unbearable debt.
On January 4, some media reported that Zhang Daibing, a doctor from the National University of Defense Technology and the founder and chairman of Hunan Changsha Yunzhihang Technology Co., Ltd., known as the "ceiling of drones", died on January 3 at the age of 47. At present, Zhang Daibing's family has issued an obituary.
It is said that Zhang Daibing jumped to his death after being in debt due to setbacks in entrepreneurship. The specific details of his death were not disclosed in the obituary.
Looking through Zhang Daibing's social account, he left very suddenly. On January 2, the day before his death, he posted 2 dynamics about drone high-altitude cleaning. From the video, he was in good condition at this time, and there was no abnormality.
After Zhang Daibing passed away, his students also published a long article to mourn him. The article said that a few days before his death, Zhang Daibing met with friends as usual, and contacted friends the day before his death. Everyone was shocked by the news of his death...
fullContent:
传军人出身，大校军衔。无人机专家因不堪债务坠楼离世年仅47岁。
 1月4日，有媒体报道，国防科技大学博士，被称为「无人机天花板」的湖南长沙市云智航科技有限公司创始人、董事长张代兵，于1月3日离世，年仅47岁。目前，张代兵家人已对外发布讣告。
 网传张代兵因创业受挫负债后跳楼身亡，具体离世细节讣告中并未公开。
 翻看张代兵的社交账号，他离开的很突然，1月2日，去世前一天还发了2条动态，是关于无人机高空清洗的内容。从视频来看，此时他的状态还好好的，看不出任何异常。
 张代兵离世后，其学生还发布长文悼念，文中称去世前几天，张代兵还照常面见了友人，去世前一天还和朋友联系，大家对他离世的消息感到无比震惊。
 据称，张代兵自幼喜欢数学，95年以优秀的成绩考入国防科技大学。在校发明了电磁飞轮储能装置，以及无线充电装置，车载半导体制冷冰箱等等，受到奖励。之后专注导航以及制导专业上，在国防科技大获得博士学位后留校工作。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 4 (Released), Shantou, Guangdong. It was revealed online that Secretary Wu Peifeng of Xili Town had promised to solve the housing land problem of Lin Huiping, a villager suffering from leukemia in the jurisdiction before October 20, 2024.
However, it is now 2025, and the problem of Lin Huiping's housing land has not been solved, and Secretary Wu Peifeng cannot be contacted now.
According to the whistleblower, villager Lin Huiping once knelt in front of the municipal government and begged for a solution.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 4 (Released) Changsha, Hunan. The property management company of Mingfa International City Phase I, in cooperation with the developer, charged parking fees to the owners of the community without legal property rights and approval from government departments, which angered all the owners of the community. Many complaints and calls to the police fell on deaf ears. Many rights-defending owners have been detained, and one of them was labeled as "involved in organized crime."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of January 3, someone posted a couplet on the signboard downstairs of the Shanghai Stock Exchange: "Ten thousand people are locked up to welcome the New Year, thousands of stocks hit the limit to bid farewell to the old year" and "Close down for the good luck"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of January 3, a fire broke out at the Yanjing Brewery in Qufu, Jining, Shandong, spreading to the dormitory building of Qufu University of Traditional Chinese Medicine next door. Flames could be seen rising from the balcony of the student dormitory.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the couple whose homestead was robbed in Xilu Town, Shantou City, Guangdong Province, are suffering from leukemia and colon cancer and have not much time left. The couple should be isolated to prevent infection in such a serious condition, but now the whole family can only squeeze into a 40-square-meter hut. The husband who suffers from leukemia has to kneel down in front of the city government many times to ask for help. Secretary Wu Peifeng of the town government once promised to solve their homestead problem on December 20, 24, but he has not been contacted until now.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, an old mother in Shenbei New District, Shenyang sent a video asking for help. Her daughter was arrested and prosecuted for petitioning and reporting the local public prosecutor's inaction. The court will be held in the Shenbei New District Court at 9.30 on January 7. The mother is worried about internal collusion in Shenbei District, and hopes that netizens will go and witness it, and help them apply for jurisdiction objections to be transferred to other courts.
The last time the Shenbei Court held a hearing, her daughter was tied up all over her body for trial. She filed multiple lawsuits and then withdrew the lawsuit to extend her detention.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens discovered that the signals of Hong Kong Jade Channel and Pearl Channel broadcast in Guangdong were censored by special supply. The netizen compared the TV synchronization images of the two places and found that the signals of Guangdong were often replaced with advertisements or non-station logo version of popular songs when playing relatively sensitive content such as program previews, BBC or Basic Law. No longer fully synchronized broadcasting like before, netizens are very afraid that the next step will be to "customize" programs for Guangdong: "I hope we won't even have the Olympics to watch in the future" P1- 01:52 Guangdong Cable cut back after the interruption, and it can be seen that the content is still different from the original version 02:49 Guangdong's special version arranged two "Live Spirit Contact" trailers to pull time to match the original version on the left 05:56 Janice's advertisement was replaced with a Greater Bay Area promotional advertisement 06:06 Guangdong's special version missed 0.5 seconds of Janice's advertisement. It can be concluded that the basis of the special version is still the original version, similar to the previous Macau version, "insert yourself...
fullContent:
近日 有网友发现香港翡翠台和明珠台在广东播出的信号被特供审查
该网友对比两地TV同步画面发现，广东的信号经常在播放到节目预告、BBC或者基本法等相对敏感内容时被替换成广告或是无台标版劲歌。不再像以前完全同步广播，网友很害怕下一步会开始给广东“定制”节目：“希望以后别连奥运都没得给我们看”
P1- 
01:52 广东有线插播完切回，可以看出内容跟原版依然不一样
02:49 广东特供版排了两次《直播灵接触》预告来拉时间，以对上左边原版同步播出
05:56 珍妮丝广告被替换为大湾区宣传广告 
06:06 广东特供版漏了0.5秒珍妮丝广告，可以断定特供版的基础仍是原版，类似于以前澳门版的操作，“自己插播自己” P2- 
01:37 广东版切回香港广告，可以看出内容不相同 
04:52 原版率先播出ident 
05:05 广东版播出ident，可以看出广东版直接忽略了PG家长指引，以拉近两版的时间 
05:16 两版同步播出 
P3-广东版特供了一个无台标的《劲歌》给你

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 31, many students from Yicheng Experimental Primary School in Lincang, Yunnan Province, vomited and had abdominal pain and went to the hospital for treatment. 121 primary school students were infected with Norovirus (a fecal-oral virus that can cause gastrointestinal reactions such as nausea and diarrhea, and can lead to severe dehydration or even death).
The official report stated that the school's rice, milk, apples, eggs, etc. were all qualified.
A reporter called the school to inquire about the situation, and the school responded: Don't worry about it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Insufficient heating, the property management played word games, secretly changed the temperature measurement results and asked the owner to sign
January 2, Shanxi Taiyuan Xiwenzhuang Yangguangli Community, the owner's home was insufficiently heated, the property management came to measure the temperature at 12.5 degrees, and when the temperature measurement results were signed and confirmed, they found that they had been changed to 18.5 degrees. Faced with the owner's doubts, the property management denied it and asked: "Who changed it?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens submitted a post suspected to be Squid Game 2, which was banned. Not much content can be found on Douyin. Even if sorted by time, the content that can be searched is from several years ago.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 1 Shanghai High Court shared a case: Unauthorized "unlocking" of new energy vehicle batteries constitutes a crime of damaging computer information systems

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the Suzhou government issued the "5.0 List of "Exemptions from Penalties or Light Penalties" for Minor Illegal Acts Involving Enterprises", which reduces and exempts penalties for some unreasonable or minor violations of laws.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 1, a shop in Chaozhou, Guangdong, encountered a man kneeling down to sell "copper coin strings"
After searching, it was found that kneeling down to sell goods is not an isolated case, and has been going on for several years across the country

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 4, a lawyer said that offshore fishing is more terrible than deep-sea fishing. For example, some companies signed a contract with the government to invest in the local area, but suddenly the government wants to break the contract and terminate the contract in advance. In order not to bear the liability for breach of contract, the government will send people to inspect your company every now and then. As long as the problem is found, the debt can be converted into a criminal debt, and a fortune can be made. Even if the government terminates the contract in advance, it will be very difficult for the company to defend its rights and sue on the government's territory later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Yinchuan, Ningxia, was hit by a 4.8-magnitude earthquake, and more than 56 small earthquakes occurred frequently in one day. People in Yinchuan were worried that this was a precursor to a larger earthquake, and began to flee Yinchuan. In the past few days, Yinchuan was congested out of the city, gas stations had long queues, and the train station was crowded with people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Dongguan, Guangdong, a netizen named "Courageous North" found a man taking photos of women's skirts several times in a shopping mall. When he tried to stop him, he was beaten by the man and hospitalized.
Currently, "Courageous North" is still receiving treatment at the Dongguan People's Hospital, and is unable to afford the medical expenses because he cannot work, while the man who took the photos and beat him was only detained for five days.
As of the time of posting, the video in which "Courageous North" said that the man who beat him was only detained for five days has been deleted.
